experience.title: Fundraising Intern
experience.description: -Served as fundraising intern to Muskurahat Foundation, NGO based in Mumbai, another branch in Ranchi, working in the domain of providing quality education to underprivileged and abandoned children.-Worked upon craft to explain the cause and how the organization operates. -Utilized social media handles for maximum reach.-Hold one-to-one open conversations and follow ups with those who showed interest in contributing to the cause either monetarily or through their valuable suggestions. -Raised INR 7, 012 through the contribution of 12 donors in the duration of one month.
experience.description_html: -Served as fundraising intern to Muskurahat Foundation, NGO based in Mumbai, another branch in Ranchi, working in the domain of providing quality education to underprivileged and abandoned children.-Worked upon craft to explain the cause and how the organization operates. -Utilized social media handles for maximum reach.-Hold one-to-one open conversations and follow ups with those who showed interest in contributing to the cause either monetarily or through their valuable suggestions. -Raised INR 7, 012 through the contribution of 12 donors in the duration of one month.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: -Developed Random Forest and ANN model for predicting elongation, yield strength & ultimate yield strength of hot rolled steels respectively.-Performed data preprocessing, explored Isolation Forest Algorithm for anomaly detection and Sensitivity Analysis for analyzing model performance.-Automated Artificial Neural Network model to observe variation in results at different parameters like number of units, kernel etc. in the hidden layer.-Obtained R-squared score of 0.965 for Random Forest, and 0.9205 and 0.9413 for ANN Model of yield strength & ultimate yield strength.-Built python script as an application, converting .py into .exe format, for the convenience of its execution at steel plant in C/C++ programming language.
experience.description_html: -Developed Random Forest and ANN model for predicting elongation, yield strength & ultimate yield strength of hot rolled steels respectively.-Performed data preprocessing, explored Isolation Forest Algorithm for anomaly detection and Sensitivity Analysis for analyzing model performance.-Automated Artificial Neural Network model to observe variation in results at different parameters like number of units, kernel etc. in the hidden layer.-Obtained R-squared score of 0.965 for Random Forest, and 0.9205 and 0.9413 for ANN Model of yield strength & ultimate yield strength.-Built python script as an application, converting .py into .exe format, for the convenience of its execution at steel plant in C/C++ programming language.

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: -Inspected more than 150 research reports, classified them in different research areas e.g. technology, medical, industry, product/service, evolutionary etc.-Prepared a database consisting report details e.g. file name, format, research year, focus using document management softwares e.g. OneDrive/SharePoint.-Records are identified through database searching and Qualitative Meta-Analysis was performed after screening the records.-Reduced manual efforts in document management while filling new entries in the database by implementing tagging technique.
experience.description_html: -Inspected more than 150 research reports, classified them in different research areas e.g. technology, medical, industry, product/service, evolutionary etc.-Prepared a database consisting report details e.g. file name, format, research year, focus using document management softwares e.g. OneDrive/SharePoint.-Records are identified through database searching and Qualitative Meta-Analysis was performed after screening the records.-Reduced manual efforts in document management while filling new entries in the database by implementing tagging technique.

experience.title: EY CAFTA Case Championship | Mitigating Financial Risk
experience.description: -Familiarized with specific terminologies of foreign exchange, interest rate and commodity risk management.-Understood the types of exposures under each of the risk types, the risk mitigation techniques, strategies and different hedging instruments applied by corporates internally in the daily course of business.-Worked on the case study problem statement by visualizing the financial data, developing a statistical tool using VAR approach, preparing an analytical dashboard and a report on macroeconomic factors affecting two currency pairs to predict how to hedge $15 million in one month.
experience.description_html: -Familiarized with specific terminologies of foreign exchange, interest rate and commodity risk management.-Understood the types of exposures under each of the risk types, the risk mitigation techniques, strategies and different hedging instruments applied by corporates internally in the daily course of business.-Worked on the case study problem statement by visualizing the financial data, developing a statistical tool using VAR approach, preparing an analytical dashboard and a report on macroeconomic factors affecting two currency pairs to predict how to hedge $15 million in one month.
